author: dws
msg: Note: This RPM still may not build at this point on RedHat 8.0, I've been seeing
a "hang" when trying to run the svnserve externals test.  However, the tests
can be turned off in the RPM, see the comments at the top of the
subversion.spec file.  This will at least allow the RPM to be built, which
wasn't the case before.  Normally I try not to submit stuff that doesn't
- Took out Requires and BuildPreReq for apache, we only need the apache-devel
- New patch to work around issue with svn-revision.txt generation.
- Took out Requires and BuildPreReq for httpd package, we only need the devel
versions of these packages to build.
- New patch to work around issue with svn-revision.txt generation.

author: kfogel
msg: Fix issue #1111: 'svn move' was failing for ".." paths.
There are probably other call sites still violating it, though.

author: rooneg
msg: Make libsvn_wc use the config options the client app passed in.
(svn_wc_statuses, svn_wc_get_default_ignores): take a config hash argument.
(svn_wc_get_default_ignores): take a config hash, and use it instead of
reading in the config file ourselves.
(svn_wc_statuses): take a config hash and pass it on to
(svn_client__can_delete): take a client context arg, update call to
(main): create an (empty) config hash so svn_client_status won't make us

author: dlr
msg: "With the current definition of RUN_SWIG_JAVA in Makefile.in the
SWIG generated Java files are located in the ${abs_builddir}. The
This patch removes the -module 'Subversion' switch as well because
this causes a lot of generated files named
Subversion.java. Obviously, only the last file survives. ;-)"
(RUN_SWIG_JAVA): SWIG runs now in the directory
the Java files are generated. Removed the -module Subversion switch.
